title: Who is in the wedding party?
content: Our siblings will be making up the wedding party.
Liam's groomsmen will be his brothers Aidan and Declan and Ellen's brother David.
Ellen's bridesmaids will be her sisters Lauren and Olivia and Liam's sister Erin.
The oldests Aidan and Lauren will be the best man and maid of honor.

title: What will be served at the reception?
content: The main course will be a Chicken and Steak Duet.
There will also vegan and vegetarian options.
If you have allergies or other dietary restrictions please make sure to note them on your RSVP.

title: What should I wear?
content: The official dress code is semi-formal, but don't stress too much about it.
The bridal party will be wearing cabernet.
